name: Penny
description: Penny doesn't care about studying old maps or puzzling over sea shanty riddles. She's a pirate so she can blow stuff up and grab whatever she wants!

gadgets.name: Salty Barrel
gadgets.description: Penny drops a barrel of salt that blocks enemy projectiles. She can also use it to burst her own gold pouches.

gadgets.name: Trusty Spyglass
gadgets.description: Penny's cannon blasts at every visible enemy position within range.

starpowers.name: Heavy Coffers
starpowers.description: Penny's gold pouches burst with a 100% wider cone after each hit.

starpowers.name: Master Blaster
starpowers.description: Penny's cannon deals 1316 damage and knocks back nearby enemies on landing.

tips: When an opponent is positioned behind another opponent, the splash effect of Penny's main attack is able to hit both of them. This makes her very effective against any Brawler that has a meat shield, like Mr. P's Porters or Nita's Bruce.

Penny's cannon forces players to keep moving around the map. Use this to your advantage to predict your opponents' movement and shoot your attacks ahead of them in the direction they are moving. They will not be able to dodge the attack if it's aimed correctly, as by changing direction they'll be hit by the turret's cannonballs.

To maximize the lifespan of the cannon, one of the very optimal placements for it is behind walls on the player's side of the map. The turret's extremely long range allows it to shoot cannonballs to the enemy's side of the map from the safety of the player's side and it is protected from enemy fire when behind walls. Additionally, close-ranged Brawlers' movement will be restricted by the walls when trying to take the turret down, causing them to be hit by its cannonballs.

Like Jessie, Penny's Super can act as a meat shield in a pinch, absorbing enemy fire for a while and allowing herself or an ally to escape from a dangerous situation. It is even more effective combined with Master Blaster, which deals 1000 damage and knocks the enemy back. However, it's less effective against opposing Pennys who can maximize their damage by hitting you and your cannon.

Penny's pouch will not burst upon impact with walls or other obstacles. Her attack will, however, burst upon impact with a Power Cube box in Showdown. Use this to your advantage in keeping enemies away from the box with the coins from when your pouch splits. This strategy works particularly well in Rockwall Brawl in 8 out of the 10 spawn points. This also helps Penny open multiple grouped up boxes at ease, while she struggles to destroy single boxes due to her slow reload speed and pouch's low damage.
It is better to put Penny's Cannon behind walls since it can attack through walls and make enemies have difficulty destroying it.

The leftover fire from her cannonballs is very effective at restricting where an enemy is willing to go, often cutting off their escape route. This is valuable in game modes focused on control, such as Gem Grab and Hot Zone. The additional damage it deals is also effective against stationary targets such as safes.
Salty Barrel is incredible against tanks and assassins because it can deal high damage if you are close to enemies. This also works if you put it near the safe, as it can destroy it very fast.
If a Brawler with a moving ability like Edgar or Buzz jumps on you, Penny's Master Blaster Star Power can be used to distance yourself from the said Brawler with moving ability.

history.description: Penny was added to the game.
Penny's cannonballs projectile speed was increased by 25%.
Her cannon's attack delay was decreased to 2.5 seconds (from 3).
Penny's main attack damage was increased to 840 (from 800).
Penny's coin burst main attack now pierces enemies.
Penny's main attack was made 50% wider.
Penny's Super no longer fires randomly and instead targets at a close enemy.
Her main attack projectile speed was decreased by 6%.
Penny was given voice lines.
The Lil Helper Penny skin was added. It was featured as a Brawlidays 2018 skin.
The Bunny Penny skin was added.
Penny's Last Blast Star Power was reworked from shooting 6 cannonballs randomly when the cannon is destroyed to fire 6 cannonballs that targets enemies in the range of the turret.
Penny's Last Blast Star Power cannonballs was decreased to 4 (from 6).
Penny's Balls of Fire Star Power was added.
Penny's animations were reworked and Bunny Penny was retextured.
Fixed a bug that didn't take into account of Penny's Last Blast bombs defeating enemies and adding to Penny's bounty in Bounty.
Penny's main attack damage was increased to 900 (from 840).
Penny's Pocket Detonator Gadget and the Dark Bunny Penny skin were added.
Dark Bunny Penny's main attack visual effects were reworked.
Penny's Captain's Compass Gadget was added.
The Smuggler Penny skin was added. It was featured as a Power League exclusive skin for Brawl Pass Season 5.
Penny's main attack damage was increased to 940 (from 900).
Penny's health was increased to 3400 (from 3200).
Penny's class was changed to Damage Dealer (from Sharpshooter).
Penny's True Silver and True Gold skins were added.
Penny's health was increased to 3800 (from 3400).
Penny's main attack projectile speed was increased by 13%.
Penny's cannonballs from her Super now set the ground on fire for 3 seconds.
Penny's cannonballs from her Super became slightly larger.
Penny's main attack range was decreased to 8 tiles (from 9).
Penny's cannonballs projectile speed from her Super was decreased slightly.
Penny and her cannon were remodeled, along with her True Silver and True Gold skins.
Penny's cannon now has an X indicator which shows where the cannonball lands.

Penny's Pocket Detonator Gadget was renamed to Salty Barrel and reworked from blowing up her cannon which knocks back enemies and deal 1500 damage to nearby enemies to dropping a barrel that blocks enemy projectiles and allows her attack to splash when hit by it.
Penny's Captain's Compass Gadget was renamed to Trusty Spyglass and reworked from firing 5 cannonballs to Penny's location to making her cannon fire at every visible enemy position within range.

Penny's Last Blast Star Power was renamed to Heavy Coffers and reworked from shooting out 4 cannonballs that deal 1860 damage to enemies upon being destroyed to making her attack splash wider and fire 2 more coins upon hitting an enemy.

Penny's Balls of Fire Star Power was renamed to Master Blaster and reworked from making her cannonballs set the ground on fire for 1200 damage over 3 seconds to making her cannon dealing 1000 damage and knocking back enemies when deployed.

Penny's flavor text was changed from “Penny shoots bags of coins, damaging the target and anyone standing behind. Her Super is a mortar-style cannon turret!” to “A rebel without a cause, mischievous Penny rules the “high seas”. She's a bonafide menace on the lookout for adventure and will stop at nothing for plunder.”
Penny's coin burst main attack now deals 25% less damage.
Penny's cannon's attack delay was increased to 3.5 seconds (from 2.5).
Penny's health was decreased to 3600 (from 3800).
The Trash Panda Penny skin was added. It was featured as a Brawl Pass Season 15 exclusive skin.
Bunny Penny's main attack and Super visual effects were slightly reworked.
Penny's class was changed to Artillery (from Damage Dealer).
Bunny Penny, Dark Bunny Penny, and their cannons were remodeled.
Dark Bunny Penny now costs 29 Gems (from 10000 Star Points).
Fixed a visual bug with Bunny Penny and Dark Bunny Penny's cannons model.
Penny's health was decreased to 3400 (from 3600).
Penny's health was decreased to 3200 (from 3400).
Penny's Salty Barrel Gadget health was decreased to 1500 (from 2000).
Smuggler Penny and her cannon were remodeled.
All Brawlers' health and damage were increased from 5% to 10% with each Power Level.
Lil Helper Penny and her cannon were remodeled.
Fixed an issue with Smuggler Penny's cannon.
Penny's Salty Barrel Gadget health was increased to 1792 (from 1500) and now scales with Power Levels.
Penny's Master Blaster Star Power damage was increased to 1185 (from 1000) and now scales with Power Levels.

Penny's flavor text was changed from "A rebel without a cause, mischievous Penny rules the "high seas". She's a bonafide menace on the lookout for adventure and will stop at nothing for plunder." to "Penny doesn't care about studying old maps or puzzling over sea shanty riddles. She's a pirate so she can blow stuff up and grab whatever she wants!"
